00127 void Decryptor::decrypt(string pass, char* inFileName, char* outFileName, bool RemoveOrigin, bool b64, bool pDisplacement,bool vectorAlgorithm, bool loud,bool header){
00128 
00129     //Convert Passwords to ASCII
00130     password = pass;
00131     cylines = "";        //Cyphered Data
00132     N = 0;                  //Number of Character Decrypted (Times looped)
00133     TAP = 0;                //Total ASCII Password
00134     OAL = 0;                //Original ASCII Letter
00135     ACL = 0;                //Algorithm Crypted Letter
00136     flow = "";            //The String in which all the manipulation will be done before writing output to file.
00137 
00138 
00139     //1. ADD PASSWORD
00140     for(int i = 0; i <(int)password.length(); i++) {
00141         TAP += password[i];
00142     }
00143     log(loud, "\n<>------Adding Password into ASCII Integer------<>\n");
00144     log(loud, password); 
00146     
00147     //2. READ FROM FILE -> BUFFER -> STRING.
00148     read_Input(inFileName);
00149     log(loud, "\n<>------INPUT Reading------<>");
00150     log(loud, flow);
00152     
00153     //3. HEADER
00154     if (header){
00155       header_Creation();
00156       
00157       log(loud, "\n<>------Header Creation------<>\n");
00158       log(loud, flow);
00159     }
00161     
00162     //4. CK DECRYPTION ALGORITHM
00163     //  -a. Convert letter to ASCII then sum with TAP;
00164     //  -b. Check that it doesn't end up out of range (32-126)
00165     casual_Algorithm();
00166     
00167     log(loud, "\n<>------CasualKrypt Algorithm------<>\n");
00168     log(loud, cylines);
00169     
00170    //5. PASSWORD DISPLACEMENT
00171     if (pDisplacement){
00172        password_Displacement();
00173        
00174        log(loud, "\n<>------Password Displacement------<>\n");
00175        log(loud, cylines);
00176     }
00178     
00179     //4. ANARCHY VECTOR ALGORITHM //
00180     if (vectorAlgorithm){
00181             vector_Algorithm();
00182             
00183             log(loud, "\n<>------Vector Algorithm------<>\n");
00184             log(loud, cylines);
00185     }
00187 
00188     //3. BASE64 DecryptION //
00189     if (b64 == true){
00190         cylines = base64_decode(cylines);
00191         
00192         log(loud, "\n<>------Base64------<>\n");
00193         log(loud, cylines);
00194     }
00196     
00197     //6. OUTPUT TO TEXTFILE
00198     output(outFileName);
00199     
00200     log(loud, "\n<>------FINAL OUTPUT------<>\n");
00201     log(loud, cylines);
00202 
00203     //7. Option: Delete Original
00204     if (RemoveOrigin){
00205         if (remove(inFileName) != 0){cout << "Couldn't delete original file";}
00206     }
00207 
00208     //ESTO VA A SER ELIMINADO POR EL LOG() FUNCTION.
00209     //8. Option: Loud Printing
00210     //if (loud) {
00211         //cout << "\n\nOriginal Text:\n" << flow1;
00212         //cout << "\n\nDecrypted Text:\n" <<cylines << "\n\n";}
00213 
00214     
00215 }

00217 void Decryptor::read_Input(char* inFileName){
00218     ifstream inFile(inFileName, ios::binary);
00219 
00220     inFile.seekg(0, ios::end);          //Select Text form beginning to end
00221     flow.reserve(inFile.tellg());       //Reserve The lenght of the text for said string
00222     inFile.seekg(0, ios::beg);          //Return the pointer to the start
00223 
00224     flow.assign((istreambuf_iterator<char>(inFile)),istreambuf_iterator<char>());
00225 }

00227 void Decryptor::password_Displacement(){
00228     int dispNum = 1+(TAP%(password.length()));
00229     int dispLetter = cylines[dispNum] - password[(password.length()-1)];
00230     //cout <<(int)dispLetter << "=" << (int)cylines[dispNum] << " - " << (int)password[(password.length()-1)] <<endl;
00231     //cout <<(char)dispLetter << "=" << (char)cylines[dispNum] << " - " << (char)password[(password.length()-1)] <<endl;
00232     //cout <<dispNum << endl;
00233     while (dispLetter < 32) {
00234         dispLetter +=94;
00235     }
00236     //cout <<(int)dispLetter<< ": " << (char)dispLetter<<endl ;
00237     cylines[dispNum] = dispLetter;
00238 }

00240 void Decryptor::casual_Algorithm(){
00241  for(int i = 0; i <(int)flow.length(); i++) {
00242         ACL = flow[i];
00243         //if (ACL ==10){OAL = 10;} //Backspace - No deberia pasar nada (?)
00244         //if (ACL ==13){OAL = 13;} //Enter
00245         if ((ACL >= LOW_ASCII) && (ACL <=HIGH_ASCII)) {
00246             OAL = ACL-TAP+N;
00247             N-=1;
00248             while (OAL < LOW_ASCII) {
00249                 OAL +=ASCII_RANGE;
00250             }
00251         }
00252         else {
00253             OAL = ACL;   //ACA NUEVO
00254         }
00255         cylines.append(1,(char)OAL);
00256     }
00257 }

00259 void Decryptor::header_Creation(){
00260   srand(time(0));
00261         char pointer = password[(TAP % password.length())];
00262         for (unsigned i = 0; i<flow.length();i++){
00263             if (flow[i] == pointer){
00264                 flow.erase(0,(i+1));
00265                 i = flow.length();
00266             }
00267         }
00268 }

00270 void Decryptor::output(char* outFileName){
00271     outFile.open(outFileName,fstream::out | ios::binary);
00272     outFile << cylines;
00273     outFile.close();
00274 }

00276 void Decryptor::vector_Algorithm(){
00277     
00278     //Precalculations
00279     
00280 
00281     int PocketSize = password.length(); //Each Pocket has this number of characters.
00282     int NumFullPockets = cylines.length() / PocketSize;  //Number of COMPLETE Pockets.
00283     
00284     if (NumFullPockets == 0){
00285         terminate(); 
00286     }
00287     
00288     int LastPocketSize = cylines.length() % NumFullPockets; //This is the Size of the last Pocket. (if it is zero then the flow.length is divisible by the password.length
00289     vector<string> cyVector;    //Vector that wil be used to store the pockets.
00290 
00291     
00292     //Forming the Packets inside the Vector
00293 
00294     for (int i= 0; i < cylines.length(); i+=(PocketSize)){
00295         cyVector.push_back(cylines.substr(i,PocketSize));
00296     }
00297     
00298     //Enforcing Order (Decryption)
00299     
00300     for (int i=0; i<(int)(cyVector.size()-2);i+=2){ //(VectorSize-1 = Final Packet.) -1 Second to last packet
00301         string temp = cyVector[i];
00302         cyVector[i] = cyVector[i+1];
00303         cyVector[i+1] = temp; 
00304     }
00305     //Reforming the String
00306     cylines = "";
00307     for (int i= 0; i<cyVector.size();i++){
00308         cylines.append(cyVector[i]);
00309     }
00310 
00311 }

00313 void Decryptor::empty(){
00314     if (outFile.good()){
00315         outFile.close();
00316     }
00317     if (inFile.good()){
00318         inFile.close();
00319     }
00320 }

00330         return;

00332     }

00341 void Decryptor::terminate(){
00342     cout << "\nERROR: Wrong Password or Wrong Selected Options Given\n"
00343          << "The text you are trying to decrypt was not cyphered with\n"
00344          << "the given password or those selected options.\n";
00345     exit(0);
